DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no response to indicate whether the current follow-up information was collected or obtained from the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Data, facts or figures about an individual; the set of relevant items would depend on the use case._Occurring in or belonging to the present time._The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.
